price: 8. (Dit is) een genade van Allah en Zijn gunst. En Allah is Alwetend, Alwijs.
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan mina al-lahi waniʿ'matan wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
